Exaggerate: The claim of Joe Biden "completely botching" the Pledge of Allegiance is an exaggeration, as the context of his words shows that he was not attempting to recite the full pledge.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Biden's words were taken out of context and he was not trying to recite the full pledge.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only provides an 8-second clip without the full context of Biden's speech.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that Biden's words were a genuine attempt at reciting the Pledge of Allegiance, when in fact he was using certain phrases to make a point about unity.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that Biden intentionally mentioned certain phrases from the Pledge of Allegiance to emphasize his commitment to unity and not dividing the country.
